SECUREGUARD INSURANCE POLICY  
 
This Cyber Liability Insurance Policy ("Policy") is entered into on January 1, 2024, between 
SecureGuard Insurance Group, a Delaware corporation ("Insurer"), and [Company Name], a 
corporation organized under the laws of Delaware ("Insured").

**COUNTERPARTY DETAILS:**  
- Company Name: SecureGuard Insurance Group  
- Address: 777 Insurance Tower, 20th Floor, Wilmington, DE 19801  
- Phone: (302) 555 -7890  
- Email: underwriting@secureguard.com  
- Website: www.secureguard.com  
- Tax ID: 55 -6677889  
- DUNS Number: 321654987  
- Contact Person: Robert Thompson, Senior Underwriter  
- Legal Entity: Delaware Corporation  
- Established: 2012  
- State Registration: 11223344  
- NAIC Number: 12345  
 
1.

TERM  
This Policy shall be effective from January 1, 2024, through January 1, 2025, with automatic 
renewal for additional one -year periods unless terminated by either party with thirty (30) 
days written notice.

PREMIUM AND PAYMENT  
3.1 Total Policy Value: The total policy value is Four Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars 
($450,000) USD.

COMPLIANCE  
SecureGuard shall maintain compliance with insurance regulations, GDPR, and state 
insurance requirements throughout the term of this Policy.

ESG REPORTING  
SecureGuard shall provide annual ESG disclosure reports detailing environmental impact and 
social responsibility initiatives.
